responses: Hi there! What questions do you have for me?
Let's start exploring cybersecurity with me!
Hope you enjoyed your journey here!
Do not provide your name to strangers, they are your personal info.
People can stalk you if they know your real name
Real name can reveal your identity, so use nickname instead
links can be harmful, so make sure it's some web you trust before clicking on it!
suspicious file can contain virus, so do not download them!
unknown file can make your computer vulnerable to hackers
keep your secret a secret. Revealing too much information may lead to identity fraud!
don't tell them anything that you won't tell a stranger on the street!
make sure that your friend's accout isn't stolen or hacked!
try to reach out to your friend in another way, and verify that it's them who send you the message!
